mapper.select: select * from xm06_t_project_update_record where project_id = #{projectId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT SUM(submit_degree) 'submit_degree', DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y-%m-%d") 'create_date' FROM xm06_t_project_update_record WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE(create_date) >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y-%m-%d")
